```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```


```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec <- 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(
    grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"),
    boro != "Missing"
  ) %>% 
  drop_na() 


```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>%
  filter(cuisine_description == "Chinese") %>% 
  group_by(boro) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~boro, y = ~score, color = ~boro,
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )


rest_inspec %>% 
  drop_na(boro, score) %>% 
  group_by(boro) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~boro, y = ~score, color = ~boro,
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )

```


```{r}

rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(cuisine_description == "Chinese") %>%
  count(grade) %>% 
  mutate(grade == fct_reorder(grade, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~grade, y = ~n, color = ~grade,
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  )


```
